properties.name: cssClass
properties.description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the column.

properties.name: dataField
properties.description: Specifies which data field provides data for the column.

properties.name: dataType
properties.description: Casts column values to a specific data type.

properties.name: hidingPriority
properties.description: Specifies the order in which columns are hidden when the UI component adapts to the screen or container size.

properties.name: sortIndex
properties.description: Specifies the order in which the column is sorted.

properties.name: sortOrder
properties.description: Specifies the sort order of column values.

properties.name: visibleIndex
properties.description: Specifies the position of the column in the resulting UI component.
